description.en: A modern love story, set during a summer on the Adriatic coast. An undeniable attraction unites Ale and Summer, two people from very different worlds.

description.tr: Inside the halls of an elite arts academy, a timid music student begins to outshine her more accomplished and outgoing twin sister when she discovers a mysterious notebook belonging to a recently deceased classmate.
Dr. Owen Maestro ve Dr. Lola Spratt, ölümcül bir global virüsü araştırıp yok etmek için Çocuk Hastanesi'nden ayrılarak Hastalık Kontrol'ün gizli bir birimine katılır.
description.en: Two American physicians in São Paulo, Brazil, discover a civilization-threatening virus and are recruited as government agents in a race against time and around the world to find a cure and uncover a dark conspiracy.

description.tr: With unprecedented access to ICE operations, as well as moving portraits of immigrants, this docuseries takes a deep look at U.S. immigration today.
description.en: A documentary looking inside the world of immigration enforcement under the Trump administration.

writers: Beth Reekles (based on the book "The Kissing Booth" by)

description.tr: Üniversite için karar zamanı yaklaşırken Elle; Noah'yla yaşadığı uzun mesafeli ilişki, Lee ile değişen dostluğu ve yeni sınıf arkadaşına karşı duyduğu ilgi ile uğraşır.
description.en: In the sequel to 2018's THE KISSING BOOTH, high school senior Elle juggles a long-distance relationship with her dreamy boyfriend Noah, college applications, and a new friendship with a handsome classmate that could change everything.

description.tr: Eski eşinin evlilik dışı ilişkisinin ardından cesareti kırılan Grace Waters, yeni bir aşk sayesinde öz güvenini tekrar kazanır. Ancak sırların açığa çıkmasının ardından, Grace'in hassas yanı yerini şiddet eğilimine bırakır.

Explore the quirkiest, most charming, and oddly inspirational competitions you never knew existed, and the determined, passionate, and incredibly skilled competitors who put it all on the line to become heroes in their own extraordinary worlds.
description.en: Explore an array of unique competitions, from the quirky to the bizarre, and meet their passionate communities in this docuseries.

description.tr: Four boyhood friends return to New Orleans’ Lower Ninth Ward after Hurricane Katrina, to find their home decimated and prospects for work swept away. Turning to a local gangster for employment, the crew is hired to pull off a daring casino heist, right in the heart of the city.
description.en: Set after Hurricane Katrina, four boyhood friends out of options reluctantly accept an offer to pull off a dangerous heist in the heart of New Orleans.

description.tr: Monster hunters Fred and Deloris Allen tangle with evil ... and family drama with their teenage twins. From the comics by Steve Niles and Damien Worm.
description.en: A semi-retired couple who work for a clandestine monster hunting agency discover dark family secrets and the truth about their employer after their magically inclined nigh adult kids reawaken a witch bent on revenge.

description.tr: The competition is fierce — and the drama undeniable — as a group of young and hungry agents try to seal the deal on luxury listings in the Hamptons.
description.en: A bird’s eye view into the day-to-day life of the Hampton’s youngest and most exclusive group of real estate agents, documenting their private lives and posh coastline listings.

title.en: Connected: The Hidden Science of Everything

description.tr: Science journalist Latif Nasser investigates the surprising and intricate ways in which we are connected to each other, the world and the universe.
description.en: Science journalist Latif Nasser investigates the surprising and intricate ways in which we are connected to each other, the world and the universe.

description.tr: Kuzey Afrika'daki bir İspanyol kentinin yakınlarında bir çocuk acı dolu bir yolculuğa çıkar, bir baba kızıyla yeniden bağ kurar ve bir sahil muhafızı suçluluk duyar.
description.en: Three people, three stories, one thing in common: Africa.

description.tr: In this contemporary take on the beloved book series, five best friends launch a baby-sitting business that's big on fun and adventure.
description.en: Based on the book series of the same name focusing on a group of young girls who start their own babysitting service.

description.tr: Onlar kendi alanlarının filozofları, öykü anlatıcıları ve öncüleri. Bu ilham verici belgesel dizisinde dört cerrah, hayatlarından ve mesleklerinden içtenlikle bahsediyor. (16 yaş ve üzeri için uygundur)
description.en: The Surgeon's Cut profiles four ground-breaking surgeons from around the world, each with a visionary approach to their craft.

description.tr: Rookie CIA field operative Isabel Alfaro works alongside infamous CIA legend Wayne Addison to bring down Rafael Bautista, Mexico's most vicious and brilliant narco. Her mission brings her into conflict with Eduardo Yzaguirre, her former boyfriend and the current Mayor of Mexico City, the cleanest and most inspirational politician in the country.
description.en: Wayne Addison, a veteran CIA officer returns to Mexico City to take down the country's most powerful drug dealer: Rafael Bautista.

description.tr: Eight of the country's best backyard smokers and pitmasters vie for the title of American Barbecue Champion in a fierce but friendly faceoff.
description.en: Food competition that follows the country's best backyard smokers and competitive barbecuers as they compete for the title of American Barbecue Champion.

description.tr: Jim Gaffigan boldly goes where no stand-up comedian has gone before: everywhere! During THE PALE TOURIST global tour Jim traveled the world meeting locals and learning about their culture. He then transformed those experiences into stand-up sets of all-new material specific to each place he visited.
description.en: In The Pale Tourist, Gaffigan boldly goes where no stand-up comedian has gone before: everywhere. The two hour-long specials were filmed as part of Gaffigan's The Pale Tourist worldwide ...

description.tr: Artık tekerlekli sandalyede olduğu gerçeğiyle yüzleşemeyen Ángel, onu terk eden kadını ölümcül bir takıntı hâline getirir ve korkunç intikam planını uygulamaya başlar.

writers: Julia Walton (based on the book by)

description.tr: Diagnosed with a mental illness halfway through his senior year of high school, a witty, introspective teen struggles to keep it a secret while falling in love with a brilliant classmate who inspires him to open his heart and not be defined by his condition.
description.en: Diagnosed with a mental illness halfway through his senior year of high school, a witty, introspective teen struggles to keep it a secret while falling in love with a brilliant classmate who inspires him to not be defined by his condition.

description.tr: With no distractions from the outside world, the singles talk to a stream of potential love interests and when a meaningful connection is made, they propose and then lay their eyes on their fiancé for the first time. Engaged and back in the real world, as the couples plan their wedding day, they will quickly discover whether they can turn their emotional connection into a physical one before the fast-approaching ceremony.
description.en: Singles who want to be loved for who they are, rather than what they look like, have signed up for a less conventional approach to modern dating.

awards: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 nomination.

description.tr: Klanını onurlandırmaya can atan genç köylü Dong Yilong (Henry Lau), savaşçıların seçildiği bir turnuvada yarışmak için riskli bir yolculuğa çıkar.
description.en: Seeing the neighboring country become more and more powerful, a warlord organizes a competition to reveal the best warriors. A young man is eager to bring honour to his clan.

description.tr: Reunited after a 17 year separation, Walter, an Angolan immigrant, is joined in the U.S. by his wife and teenage daughter. Now absolute strangers sharing a one-bedroom apartment, they discover a shared love of dance that may help overcome the emotional distance between them.
Four young men who want to leave their dystopian world behind and go to a distant paradise execute a money robbery, a daring act that will have unexpected consequences.
description.en: In the near future, a financial crisis will hit Korea and slums arise. From those areas, a group of young people commit crime to survive.

description.tr: Gözden düşmüş bir yönetmen, bir film yıldızıyla herkesin önünde ağız dalaşına girdikten sonra misilleme amacıyla aktörün kızını kaçırır ve arama çalışmalarını filme alır.
description.en: A filmmaker kidnaps the daughter of a movie star, and while the star searches for his daughter the director films the desperate search in real time for his next blockbuster movie.

description.tr: Go Nan Do, the owner, and creator of an IT research company must hide his existence from the world after his involvement as a hacker in a major case ten years ago. Presumed dead, the only people who knew of his existence are his step-sister and his companies CEO. Han So Yeon, an assistant manager at a glasses company, keeps her distance from people, due to her inability to recognize people’s faces.
description.en: A successful woman, who has aphasia and this inability to recognize faces interferes with her social life.

title.tr: A Babysitter's Guide to Monster Hunting
title.en: A Babysitter's Guide to Monster Hunting
title.original: A Babysitter's Guide to Monster Hunting

writers: Joe Ballarini (based on the book by)

description.tr: Recruited by a secret society of babysitters, a high schooler battles the Boogeyman and his monsters when they nab the boy she's watching on Halloween.
description.en: A babysitter embarks on a mission to save a child who's been abducted by monsters.

writers: Lois Lowry (based on the book by)

description.tr: Fena hâlde bencil ebeveynlere sahip dört kardeş, onlardan sonsuza dek kurtulmak için bir plan yapar ve kendilerine kusursuz biçimde sorunlu bir aile kurar.
description.en: Convinced they'd be better off raising themselves, the Willoughby children hatch a sneaky plan to send their selfish parents on vacation. The siblings then embark on their own high-flying adventure to find the true meaning of family.

description.tr: A paranormal researcher searches obsessively for a cursed home where something terrible happened to a mother and her child long ago.
description.en: The legendary horror franchise that is “Ju-On” is set to once again shake the world as Netflix Japan sets to release its first-ever horror of Netflix Japan Original, "JU-ON: Origins."

description.tr: Boss Baby'nin intikam için aç olan birkaç kötü adamla savaşması gereken etkileşimli bir simülasyon oluşturulur. Simülasyonda yapılan seçimler, izleyicinin Baby Corp. içindeki kariyer yolunu belirleyecektir.

title.original: The Boss Baby: Get That Baby!

title.tr: Shaun the Sheep: Adventures from Mossy Bottom
title.en: Shaun the Sheep: Adventures from Mossy Bottom
title.original: Shaun the Sheep: Adventures from Mossy Bottom

description.tr: Clever sheep Shaun, loyal dog Bitzer and the rest of the Mossy Bottom gang cook up oodles of fun and mischief on the farm.
description.en: Shaun is the center of adventure and excitement at Mossy Bottom Farm for a sixth series on Netflix. The series introduces four new characters to Mossingham: Stash, Rita and new rival Farmer Ben, and his Afghan hound, Lexi.

description.tr: Callan, Los Angeles'ı Muerte ve Drago'dan korumak için ekibiyle geri döner. Callan, şehri kurtarmak adına bir zamanlar kötülükle beslenen Gunnar ile güçlerini birleştirmek zorunda kalır.
description.en: Armed with an explosive powerful ancient cross amulet, Callan (Brian Austin Green) is back with his extraordinary team of weapons experts to defend Los Angeles from its biggest threat ...

description.tr: Eski eroin bağımlısı Daniel Léger, yanlış nedenlerle yanlış kişilerle uyuşturucu anlaşmasına karışır. Anlaşma kötüye gidince Daniel bir Tayland hapishanesine atılır ve 100 yıl hapis cezasına çarptırılır. Bangkok'taki hapishanesinden kurtulmaya çalışırken, mahkumiyet haberi, Daniel'i haksız yere suçlamaktan sorumlu gizli polislerin peşine düşmeye karar veren Globe and Mail gazetecisi Victor Malarek'in dikkatini çeker.
description.en: Ex heroin junkie, Daniel Léger, gets involved in a drug deal whit the wrong people for the wrong reasons. When the deal goes sour, Daniel gets thrown into a Thai prison and slapped whit 100-year sentence. While he tries to survive his Bangkok incarceration, the news of his conviction captures the attention of Globe and Mail journalist Victor Malarek, who decides to go after the shady undercover cops responsible for wrongly accusing Daniel.

description.tr: Charming comic Michael McIntyre talks family, technology, sharks, accents and the time he confused himself for a world leader in this stand-up special.
description.en: Charming comic Michael McIntyre talks family, technology, sharks, accents and the time he confused himself for a world leader in this stand-up special.

description.tr: The Emmy-nominated series delves into the juicy, smoky world of barbecue, visiting acclaimed chefs and pitmasters in the US, Australia and Mexico.
description.en: The critically-acclaimed series returns for its latest iteration, delving into the smoky, juicy world of barbecue. Featured chefs and pitmasters include Tootsie Tomantez, Lennox Hastie, Rodney Scott, and Rosalia Chay Chuc.

description.tr: Bu doğa dizisinin kullandığı yeni teknoloji, avlanan aslanlardan uçan yarasalara varan farklı canlıların gizli yaşamını ortaya çıkarmak için gecenin perdesini aralıyor. (7 yaş ve üzeri için uygundur)
description.en: This nature series' new technology lifts night's veil to reveal the hidden lives of the world's creatures, from lions on the hunt to bats on wings.

description.tr: Leading with curiosity and keeping it real, Gwyneth Paltrow and her goop team look at psychedelics, energy work and other challenging wellness topics.
description.en: Leading with curiosity, Gwyneth Paltrow and her goop team look at psychedelics, energy work and other challenging wellness topics.

description.tr: To survive in a dog-eat-dog world, two rival lawyers with high-class clientele tear apart anything that stands in the way of their ambitions.
description.en: 'Hyena' deals with very competitive, private lawyers who only work for the richest 1% of society.

description.tr: Bu eğlenceli reality yarışma programında çevrimiçi oyuncular, büyük para ödülü için flört etme, bağ kurma ve sahte profil oluşturmadaki tüm hünerlerini sergiliyor.
description.en: Be yourself or someone else? In this fun reality competition, online players try their best to flirt, bond and catfish their way to a R$ 300,000 prize.

description.tr: Dizi, adaletsiz bir dünyada yükselmeyi başaran inatçı ve cesur bir grup insanın etrafında dönmektedir. Itaewon’da 'Jagga' adlı bir restoran zincirinin sahibi, Jang Dae-Hee (Yoo Jae-Myung) ve onun oğlu (Ahn Bo-Hyun), Park Sae-Ro-Yi’nin (Park Seo-Joon) hayatını mahvetmekle kalmaz, babasının ölümüne neden olurlar. Park Sae-Ro-Yi, intikam almak için sahibi oldukları 'Jagga' restoran zincirini yok etmeye karar verir ve aynı bölgede bir restoran açar.
description.en: The story of Park Sae Ro Yi who opens a restaurant in Itaewon.

description.tr: Acclaimed filmmakers from around the world channel their creativity during COVID-19 isolation with this diverse, genre-spanning collection of short films.
description.en: Confined at home as a consequence of the COVID-19 outbreak, filmmakers created personal, moving stories that capture our shared experience of life in quarantine.

description.tr: Bir grup tasarımcı, markalarını yeni bir seviyeye getirmek için New York, Paris ve Tokyo'da yarışıyor.
description.en: A group of designers compete in New York, Paris and Tokyo to bring their brands to a new level.

description.tr: A 6-year old girl is kidnapped by a mysterious masked man, who demands an unusual ransom. To save his daughter, Dr. Avinash Sabharwal must kill someone! Meanwhile, Kabir Sawant's journey continues in the hostile environment of the Delhi Crime branch. Lies, deceit and mind games begin when Kabir is given charge of the investigation, and meets Avinash.
description.en: "A father's love can save a life... or take one," sets the tone for a dark and gritty series.

title.tr: Babenco - Alguém Tem que Ouvir o Coração e Dizer: Parou
title.en: Babenco: Tell Me When I Die
title.original: Babenco - Alguém Tem que Ouvir o Coração e Dizer: Parou

description.tr: Besieged by cancer and nearing the end, the genius Argentine-Brazilian filmmaker Héctor Babenco (1946-2016) asks Bárbara Paz, his wife, for one last wish: to be the protagonist of his own death.
description.en: "I have already lived my death and now all that is left is to make a film about it." So said the filmmaker Hector Babenco to Bárbara Paz when he realized he did not have much time left. She...

description.tr: A story about a funeral eulogy speaker who loses faith in her work and tries to sabotage her husband's funeral.
description.en: While still working through her husband's recent death, a widow offers her services as an eulogy speaker. With her fresh personality, she is soon known as a fun alternative to the other typically somber German eulogy speakers.

description.tr: Bu belgesel dizisi, 2011'de kariyerinin zirvesindeki Fransız politikacı Dominique Strauss-Kahn'ın karıştığı cinsel saldırı davasını konu alıyor.
description.en: This docuseries follows the 2011 sexual assault case involving french politician Dominique Strauss-Kahn at the height of his career.

description.tr: Bu belgesel dizisi, politikacı Detlev Rohwedder'in 1991'de, Almanya'nın çalkantılı yeniden birleşme döneminin tam ortasında öldürülmesini inceliyor. (13 yaş ve üzeri için uygundur)
description.en: In April 1991, Detlev Rohwedder, the head of Treuhand, the East German Privatization and Restructuring Agency, was assassinated in Dusseldorf. This documentary details the strange evidence recovered.

description.tr: Bir felaketi öngören bir baba olan Jusqu'au déclin, Antoine, Alain'in özerk perdesinde öğrettiği hayatta kalma eğitimine katılıyor. Doğal, ekonomik veya sosyal kriz korkusu nedeniyle, grup çeşitli olası kıyamet senaryolarıyla yüzleşmek üzere eğitilmiştir. Ancak, yaşayacakları felaket tahmin ettikleri felaket olmayacak.
description.en: A fatal accident at a remote survivalist training camp sends participants into a panic - and sets the stage for a chilling showdown.

description.tr: Dreams come true for real families looking for the perfect home tailored to their own unique style, thanks to Shea and Syd McGee of Studio McGee.
description.en: Shea and Syd McGee of Studio McGee help dreams come true for real families looking to update their home tailored to their own unique style.

description.tr: A remote village becomes the arena of a breathless battle when an undead East India Company officer and his battalion of zombie redcoats attack a squad of modern-day soldiers.
description.en: A remote village becomes the arena of a breathless battle when an undead East India Company officer and his battalion of zombie redcoats attack a squad of modern-day soldiers.

description.tr: From the creator of Survivor, 66 teams descend upon Fiji to compete in the most epic global adventure race ever attempted. Bear Grylls hosts this 11-day expedition that pushes competitors to their physical and emotional limits. For the veteran teams the goal is to win – but for most, the dream is to finish and prove to themselves and the world, that they can prevail in the World’s Toughest Race.
description.en: The ultimate team survival competition pits contestants in a series of grueling activities in a race around the globe.

description.tr: In this true crime docuseries, some of the most dramatic trials of all time are examined with an emphasis on how the media may have impacted verdicts.
description.en: In our modern media landscape where real courtroom dramas have increasingly been transformed into a form of entertainment, this series reflects on some of the most dramatic and memorable trials in recent history.

description.tr: The head of a small Chilean football club becomes a key player in the 2015 FIFA corruption scandal.
description.en: The head of a small Chilean football club becomes a key player in the 2015 FIFA corruption scandal.
Live-action series based on the adventures of a teenage witch named Bibi and her best friend, Tina.

description.tr: Determined to escape a dead-end life, a gifted high school student turns to a world of serious crime to ensure he can pay for college.
description.en: A model high school student who's steeped in a world of serious crime finds his double life upended when a classmate takes an interest in his secret.

title.tr: SanPa: luci e tenebre di San Patrignano
title.original: SanPa: luci e tenebre di San Patrignano

description.tr: Amidst a heroin crisis, Vincenzo Muccioli cared for the addicted, earning him fierce public devotion -- even as charges of violence began to mount.
description.en: Amidst a heroin crisis, Vincenzo Muccioli cared for the addicted, earning him fierce public devotion -- even as charges of violence began to mount.

description.tr: Lino, soygun amaçlı arabalar yapmakta usta, yetenekli bir araba tamircisidir. Ancak ters giden bir soygun nedeniyle tutuklanır. Özel bir narkotik polisi komiseri tarafından keşfedilen Lino'ya hapse düşmemesi için bir anlaşma teklif edilir. Dokuz ay sonra Lino, tartışmasız biçimde kendini göstermiştir. Ama haksız yere cinayetle suçlanınca masumiyetini kanıtlamak için tek bir seçeneği kalır: cinayet silahından çıkan ve kayıp bir arabaya saplanıp kalan mermiyi bulmak.
description.en: A small time delinquent, turned police mechanic for a go fast task force, is forced to defend his innocence when his mentor is killed by dirty cops.

description.tr: While traveling across the country in a run-down RV, drag queen Ruby Red discovers an unlikely sidekick in AJ: a tough-talking 10-year-old stowaway.
description.en: Ruby Red, a down-on-her-luck drag queen traveling across America, develops an unlikely sidekick named AJ.

description.tr: Tough talk takes a soft turn as Nate, played by comedian Natalie Palamides, explores humor, heartbreak, sexuality and consent — with a live audience.
Altı çift hayatta kalma becerileri olduğunu kanıtlayarak Alaska'nın engin ve zorlu vahşi doğasının derinliklerindeki olağanüstü bir evin tapusunu kazanmak için yarışıyor.
description.en: Six British couples compete to impress the current, elderly owners of a remote yet breathtaking property in Alaska. The winners will win the property deep within the Alaskan wilderness.

description.tr: Oğlu, eski karısına tecavüz etmek ve onu öldürmeye çalışmakla suçlandığında Alicia, hayatını sonsuza dek değiştirecek bir yolculuğa çıkar.
description.en: Desperate and confused, Alicia will do the impossible to keep her son from prison after he's convicted of trying to murder his ex-wife.

description.tr: Uzun zamandır arkadaşlar ve yerel radyo sunucuları Maggie ve Jack, şovlarını bir araya getirme umuduyla aileleri ve dinleyicileri için bir çiftmiş gibi taklit eder.
description.en: Longtime friends and local radio hosts Maggie and Jack fake it as a couple for their families and listeners in hopes of getting their show syndicated.

description.tr: Stanley, an aging fast food worker, prepares to work his final graveyard shift after 38 years. When he's asked to train his replacement, Jevon, Stanley's weekend takes an unexpected turn.
description.en: Stanley's last shift at his fast food job takes an unexpected turn when he befriends a young African-American work employee.

description.tr: Two rival brothers must work together to keep their brewery in business, but shenanigans keep foaming up their company with chaos.
description.en: Two rival brothers must work together to keep their brewery in business, but shenanigans keep foaming up their company with chaos.

description.tr: Değişim rüzgârları eserken iki kadın, onlarca yıllık aşklarını gizledi. Ama cinsel kimliklerini ileri yaşta açıklamak, beraberinde başka zorluklar getirecek.
description.en: Falling in love in 1947, two women -- Pat Henschel and pro baseball player Terry Donahue -- begin a 65-year journey of love and overcoming prejudice.

description.tr: Küçük bir Teksas kasabasından Filipinli bir genç, bir country müzik sanatçısı olarak hayallerinin peşinden gitmek için savaşırken, ailesiyle birlikte kalmak veya bildiği tek evi terk etmek arasında karar vermek zorunda kalır.
description.en: A Filipina teen from a small Texas town fights to pursue her dreams as a country music performer while having to decide between staying with her family or leaving the only home she has known.

description.tr: A down and out cop lands the case of a lifetime when four suspects are nabbed in the assassination attempt of a prime time journalist. The case turns out to be a devious maze where nothing is what it looks like. The pursuit of it leads him to the dark netherworld - the 'Paatal Lok', and to shocking discoveries in the past of the four suspects.
description.en: A down and out cop lands the case of a lifetime when four suspects are nabbed in the assassination attempt of a journalist. The pursuit of it leads him to 'Paatal Lok', and to shocking discoveries in the past of the four suspects.

description.tr: From nature to nurture, this docuseries explores the groundbreaking science that reveals how infants discover life during their very first year.
description.en: A look at how infants learn and discover during their first year of life.

description.tr: In a world where data is no longer private, con artists uncover a sinister surveillance scheme headed by the government and a greedy corporation.
description.en: In a world where data is no longer private, con artists uncover a sinister surveillance scheme headed by the government and a greedy corporation.

description.tr: A seemingly perfect romance turns dark when a mother becomes convinced her daughter’s new boyfriend has a sinister connection to her own past.
Wielding a light-up sword through the dark corners of a high school, a nurse with an unusual gift protects students from monsters only she can see.
description.en: Wielding a light-up sword through the dark corners of a high school, a nurse with an unusual gift protects students from monsters only she can see.

description.tr: Host Felipe Castanhari explores science, history, mysteries and marvels, uncovering mind-blowing facts with help from his lab buddies.
description.en: Host Felipe Castanhari explores science, history, mysteries and marvels, uncovering mind-blowing facts with help from his lab buddies.

description.tr: Gloria Groove and Alexia Twister make drag dreams come true as they help six artists find the confidence to own the stage in this makeover show.
description.en: What happens when two godmothers decide to help aspiring drag queens and drag kings?

description.tr: Aftershow for the show "The Boys" featuring members of the cast, creative team and other special guests.
description.en: A talk show about Season 2 of the Amazon Original Series "The Boys", hosted by Aisha Tyler and featuring the creators and cast from the series, including Karl Urban (Butcher), Jack Quaid (...

description.tr: On their dying planet, the Autobots and Decepticons battle fiercely for control of the AllSpark in the Transformers universe's origin story.
description.en: Animated series set in the world of battling Autobots and Decepticons.

description.tr: Bir milyarderin kızı, anne babasını aşçılık hayalinin peşinden gitmesine izin vermeye zorlamak için, para sıkıntısı çeken bir boksörle sevgili rolü yapar.
description.en: To realize their culinary and boxing dreams, the daughter of a billionaire forms a mutually beneficial alliance with the son of a struggling single mom.

description.tr: Comedian and Trump lip-synching sensation Sarah Cooper tackles politics, race and other light topics in a sketch special packed with celebrity guests.
description.en: A variety special full of issues of politics, race, gender and class. Sarah will also be joined by special guests.

description.tr: Fate plays a vital role in connecting the life of Bantu, a son who seeks validation from his cold-hearted father with the life of Raj, whose millionaire father wishes that he was more assertive.
description.en: Bantu grows up being constantly subjected to his father's scorn. Learning of his real parentage, he decides to carve a place for himself within the family he truly belongs to.

title.en: Mucho Mucho Amor: The Legend of Walter Mercado

description.tr: Once the world's most famous astrologer, Walter Mercado seeks to resurrect a forgotten legacy. Raised in the sugar cane fields of Puerto Rico, Walter grew up to become a gender non-conforming, cape-wearing psychic whose televised horoscopes reached 120 million viewers a day for decades before he mysteriously disappeared.
description.en: Every day for decades, Walter Mercado — the iconic, gender non-conforming astrologer — mesmerized 120 million Latino viewers with his extravagance and positivity.

description.tr: To detail how drugs push people into risky — even deadly — behaviors, a former CIA analyst investigates the economics of six illicit substances.
description.en: To understand the origins and true impact of the business of drugs, a former CIA analyst investigates the economics of six illicit substances.

description.tr: Memo lives on a remote Chilean sheep farm, hiding a beautiful singing voice from the outside world. A recluse with a glittery flair, he can't stop dwelling on the past, but what will happen once someone finally listens?

Every year, thousands of high schoolers enter the August Wilson monologue competition for a chance to perform on Broadway. This film follows these students, examining how Wilson and his characters speak to a new generation, inspiring them to listen to his words and find their own voice.
Home cooks compete to transform leftovers into delicious creations, finding ways to give old leftovers new life, all in the hopes of winning a $10,000 prize.
description.en: Home cooks compete to transform leftovers into delicious creations, finding ways to give old leftovers new life, all in the hopes of winning a $10,000 prize.

description.tr: Bu belgesel dizisi, sağlık ve tedavi ticareti yapan kârlı şifa sektörünü derinlemesine inceliyor. Peki sunulan ürünler vaatlerini yerine getirebiliyor mu?
description.en: This docu-series takes a deep dive into the lucrative wellness industry, which touts health and healing. But do these wellness trends live up to their promises?

description.tr: Hayali bir dünya, eksantrik bir oyuncakcının, maceracı torununun ve hayatlarını sonsuza dek değiştirme gücüne sahip büyülü bir icadın tatil masalında hayat buluyor.
description.en: An imaginary world comes to life in a holiday tale of an eccentric toymaker, his adventurous granddaughter, and a magical invention that has the power to change their lives forever.

description.tr: An outstanding lineup of entertainers gathers in the Kennedy Center Concert Hall to salute Dave Chappelle, recipient of the 22nd annual Mark Twain Prize for American Humor.

title.tr: Dave Chappelle: The Kennedy Center Mark Twain Prize
title.original: Dave Chappelle: The Kennedy Center Mark Twain Prize

description.tr: Bir kereste fabrikası sahibi ve genç yaştaki kızı, ücra yerdeki mülklerine bir uyuşturucu satıcısının çalıntı kokain saklamasının ardından ölümcül bir kavgaya bulaşır.Saïd, ormanın derinliklerindeki kereste fabrikasını 18 yaşındaki kızı Sarah'ya daha iyi bir gelecek sağlamak için satmaya karar verir. Ancak çıraklarından birinin erkek kardeşi tarafından köşeye sıkıştırıldığından ve fabrikanın içine büyük miktarda kokain saklamaya zorlandığından haberi yoktur.Uyuşturucunun ait olduğu çete çıkagelince Saïd, bu sert adamların ne kadar kararlı olduğunu hemen anlar. Sayıca az olsalar da, kendi fabrikasını en iyi o bilmektedir. Sarah'yı korumak için bu adamlara karşılık vermek zorunda kalan Saïd, kereste fabrikasını bir savaş kampına dönüştürür. Ölü sayısı yükseldikçe, intikam hırsı da artar...
In this interactive special, Harold and George need your decision-making skills to stop Krupp from blowing their beloved treehouse to smithereens.
description.en: In this interactive special, Harold and George need your decision-making skills to stop Krupp from blowing their beloved treehouse to smithereens

title.tr: All In: The Fight for Democracy
title.en: All In: The Fight for Democracy
title.original: All In: The Fight for Democracy

description.tr: Examines the often overlooked, yet insidious issue of voter suppression in the United States in anticipation of the 2020 presidential election. With the perspective and expertise of Stacey Abrams, the former Minority Leader of the Georgia House of Representatives, the film offers an insider’s look into laws and barriers to voting that most people don’t even know is a threat to their basic rights as citizens of the United States.
description.en: The documentary takes a look at the history, and current activism against voter suppression; barriers to voting that most people don't even know is a threat to their basic rights as citizens of the United States.

writers: Matthew Quick (based on the book 'Sorta Like a Rock Star' by)

description.tr: Amber Appleton, bir otobüste yaşamaktadır. Annesinin erkek arkadaşının onları kovmasından sonra Amber, annesi ve sadık köpekleri Boby Big Boy ile birlikte, annesinin kullandığı okul otobüsü ‘Hello Yeloow’un arkasında kamp kurarlar. Umut ve iyimserlik prensesi olan Amber, kötü şeyleri kafasına takmamaktadır. O artık, alkolik annesi ve arkadaşlarının hayatını kurtarmaya odaklanır.
description.en: An optimistic high schooler with musical aspirations must learn to accept help from her friends to overcome her personal hardships and fulfill her dreams.

description.tr: Okulda yaşanan trajik bir silahlı saldırının ardından çocuklarının yasını tutan iki kederli ebeveyn içinde bulundukları duygusal boşlukta bir yolculuğa çıkar.

title.tr: If Anything Happens I Love You
title.original: If Anything Happens I Love You

description.tr: Hayatı bir şaka nedeniyle altüst olan çalışkan bir lise son öğrencisi, farklı yapmış olmayı dilediği şeylerin listesini paylaşır. Belki de bunları yapması hâlâ mümkündür.
description.en: After a prank blows up on a high school senior's life, he shares a list of certain things he wishes he'd done differently.

description.tr: Sosyal medya fenomeni Ana, telefonda konuşurken arabasını çarpınca huysuz büyükbabasının çiftliğine gönderilir ve dijital detoks yapmaya zorlanır.
description.en: Follows the young Ana, who studied fashion design dreaming of becoming a great stylist but dropped everything to become a digital influencer for a famous brand.

description.tr: Kabiliyetli bir genç sanatçı popüler bir yetenek yarışmasında herkesin dikkatini çeker. Ancak onun asıl hedefi, jüri üyesi olan babasının sevgisini kazanmaktır.

Coffee & Kareem'de Ed Helms, Detroit’li bir polis memuruna, Taraji P. Henson ise onun kız arkadaşına hayat veriyor. Polis, kız arkadaşının 11 yaşındaki oğluyla birlikte aksiyon dolu bir maceraya atılarak adını temize çıkarmaya ve şehrin en acımasız suçlusunu alaşağı etmeye çalışır. “Benjamin Button’ın Tuhaf Hikayesi” ile Oscar’a aday gösterilen, “Empire” dizisinin Altın Küre ödüllü yıldızı Taraji P. Henson ve “Felekten Bir Gece”, “Tatil Zamanı” ve “Yakalandın!” gibi filmlerle tanınan komedi filmlerinin tanıdık yüzü Ed Helms filmin başrollerini üstleniyor. Filmin yönetmenliğini ise “Take Me Home Tonight”, “Goon” ve “Ya Aşksa” gibi filmlerle tanınan ve bu sene Kumail Nanjiani ve Dave Bautista’lı komedi filmi “Stuber” ile karşımıza çıkmaya hazırlanan Kanadalı yönetmen Michael Dowse üstleniyor. Filmin senaryosuna Shane McCarthy imza atarken, yapımcı kadrosunda başrol Helms ve Mike Falbo yer alıyor.
description.en: Twelve-year-old Kareem Manning hires a criminal to scare his mom's new boyfriend -police officer James Coffee - but it backfires, forcing Coffee and Kareem to team up in order to save themselves from Detroit's most ruthless drug kingpin.

description.tr: A group of friends set out on a road trip when an unexpected fourth passenger forces an abrupt change of plans.
description.en: Four girlfriends on a weekend road trip end up on a journey of self-discovery.

description.tr: Matchmaker Sima Taparia guides clients in the U.S. and India in the arranged marriage process, offering an inside look at the custom in a modern era.
description.en: Matchmaker Sima Taparia guides clients in the U.S. and India in the arranged marriage process, offering an inside look at the custom in a modern era.

description.tr: 4400 yıl boyunca insan eli değmemiş bir mezarı gün ışığına çıkaran Mısırlı arkeologlar, bu olağanüstü keşfin geçmişine ait gizemleri çözmeye çalışır.
description.en: After unearthing a tomb that had been untouched for 4,400 years, Egyptian archaeologists attempt to decipher the history of the astonishing find.

description.tr: Down-and-out musician Bastian battles the blues as he returns home for Christmas and encounters a series of not-so-cheery surprises.
description.en: Bastian returns home for the holidays to learn that his brother is dating his ex, and if that wasn't enough, his parents are also keeping a big secret.

description.tr: A street in Paris. A stranger thinks he is recognized in Joachim a soldier who died in Bosnia on August 21st, 1983, the very day Joachim was born.
description.en: Joachim is approached by a man believing him to be a Bosnian soldier who died on the day Joachim was born. Suspicious that he is the reincarnation of the soldier, Joachim travels to ...

description.tr: At this mysterious late-night food cart run by an equally mysterious woman and her part-timer, customers are provided a space for respite and counseling through their dreams. But most importantly, everyone here is treated equally—living or dead.
description.en: A young man with an unique ability begins working for a centuries-old bar owner who resolves her customers' emotional troubles by entering their dreams.

writers: Peter Stamm (based on a short story by)

description.tr: Alice ve Niklas, en büyük dileği kendi çocuklarına sahip olmak olan genç bir çifttir. Birkaç başarısız girişimden sonra, zihinlerini temizlemek için Sardunya'ya tatile gitmeye karar verirler. Orada, diledikleri her şeye sahip gibi görünen Avusturyalı bir aileyle tanışırlar. Fakat görünüş aldatıcı olabilir...
description.en: A couple facing fertility issues finds their marriage tested on a vacation to a Sardinian resort - and the family next door only adds to the tension.

description.tr: Three gutsy kids from a rapidly gentrifying Bronx neighborhood stumble upon a sinister plot to suck all the life from their beloved community.
description.en: A group of young friends from the Bronx fight to save their neighborhood from gentrification...and vampires.

description.tr: Six-year old Hank and his best pal, a giant trash truck, explore the world around them on fantastical adventures with their animal friends.
description.en: Six-year old Hank and his best pal, a giant trash truck, explore the world around them on fantastical adventures with their animal friends.

description.tr: Jahkor, asla babası gibi olmak istemeyen bir gençtir. Suça bulaşıp hapse düşen babası da asla oğlunu hapiste görmek istemez. Ancak Jahkor da kendisini parmaklıklar ardında bulur. Annesiyle birlikte yaşayan ve sevgilisinin hamile olduğunu öğrenen Jahkor, Oakland’da rap yapma hayalleri kuruyordur. Dünyadaki sorumluluklarını yerine getirmeye çalışırken yanlış yola sürüklenen Jahkor tıpkı babası gibi hapis cezasına çarptırılır. Hapishanedeyken babası ile kendi hayatı arasında bir bağ kuran Jahkor, bu süreçte kendisini suça iten insanları, koşulları düşünür ve kendini keşfetme yolculuğuna çıkar.
description.en: A young man who committed a homicide deals with the repercussions of his action.

description.tr: İşinde ve evliliğinde kriz yaşayan bir yazar, kendilerini keşfetmekte olan üç yakın dostuna sığınarak onlardan destek alır. Elísabet Benavent'in romanlarından uyarlandı.
description.en: Valeria is a writer who's hit a dead end with both her writing and her husband. She finds solace in her three friends Carmen, Lola and Nerea.

description.tr: A group of former high school pals who see their friendship put to test amid their struggles with love, marriage and careers.
description.en: This is a story about four high school classmates. The storylines are intertwined with one another. Here are a middle-aged director who is frustrated with his undiscovered talents, a ...

description.tr: Yıllardır görüşmeyen bir grup çocukluk arkadaşı, onları büyüten Nezihe'nin rahatsızlanması üzerine onun yanında olmak için İzmir'de yeniden bir araya gelir. (16 yaş ve üzeri için uygundur)
description.en: A group of old friends get together to be with their beloved aunt/grandmother who took care of them when they were kids for her last days. And things get complicated.

description.tr: Kaygısız yaşam tarzı tehlikede olan zengin ve çekici Joseph ( Josh Swickard ), Noel'den önce  ailesinin arazisini satması için, çalışkan bir çiftçi olan Callie'nin  ( Lorynn York ) yanında çiftlik hizmetlisi olarak işe başlar.
description.en: With his carefree lifestyle on the line, a wealthy charmer poses as a ranch hand to get a hardworking farmer to sell her family's land before Christmas.

description.tr: Ölümcül bir kansere yakalanan hamile bir kadın, doğmamış kızına her doğum gününde bir tane açması için 18 duygusal hediye bırakır.
description.en: Inspired by the extraordinary story of Elisa Girotto, the woman who moved the world by leaving 18 birthday gifts for her daughter when she discovered that she would have little time with her.

description.tr: Merlin'in çırağı; insanlar, troller ve sihirli dünyalar arasında gerilimin yükseldiği Camelot'ta zamanın ötesine geçen bir macerada Arcadia'nın kahramanlarına katılıyor.

description.tr: A cast of quirky critters and Mother Nature herself narrate this funny science series, which peeks into the lives of Earth's most incredible animals.

description.tr: A determined woman works to rid an Argentine soccer club of the violent crime and corruption surrounding its intense fanbase.
description.en: An unflinching exploration of Argentina's infamous soccer "barra bravas," bare torso-ed soccer fans feared by the public and even police responsible for fatalities at soccer matches.

description.tr: An illustration of Nils Frahm’s lauded ability as a composer and passionate live artist as well as the enchanting atmosphere of his already legendary Funkhaus shows.
A young woman from a small town accuses the college heartthrob of sexual assault.

Vikram Rudraraju is a 30-year-old cop working for the Telangana State Police. While Vikram is battling with his own traumatic past, the stakes get high when a girl called Preethi mysteriously disappears in Hyderabad and Vikram has to solve the case at any cost.
Heinous criminals have avoided capture despite massive rewards and global investigations. This docuseries profiles some of the world’s most wanted.
description.en: Heinous criminals have avoided capture despite massive rewards and global investigations. This docuseries profiles five of the world's most wanted.

description.tr: Shuhei'nin istikrarsız annesi, oğlunun onun denetiminin ötesindeki dünyayı tanımaya başlamasıyla kendini tehdit altında hisseder. Bu durum aileyi bir trajediye sürükler.
From the mind of comedian Iliza Shlesinger comes a fun, irreverent mix of kooky characters, sly social commentary and pop culture gags.
description.en: From the mind of Iliza Shlesinger comes a secret world filled with absurd characters, insight into the female experience, and irreverent yet poignant social commentary.

description.tr: When Sgt. First Class Brian Eisch is critically wounded in Afghanistan, it sets him and his sons on a journey of love, loss, redemption and legacy.

description.en: Bad boy of the French football, arrogant, precocious, misunderstood, scorer, unclassifiable, genius, unmanageable. Despite a having a career of almost 20 years at the highest level, Nicolas Anelka is still hard to define.

Sodhi and his daredevil band of men and women who fought a heroic battle for the independence of India as part of the Indian National Army which was forged out of British defeat in Singapore during WWII and led by the charismatic, indomitable Indian leader Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose.

Bu arada sıradışı bir polis, daha fazla kan dökülmeden önce cinayetlerin gizemini çözmek için zamana karşı yarışır.

description.tr: From Facebook thumbs up to the battle of stones, a history of hope, fear, despair, anger, pride and elation, the film is the real-time chronicle of the two most exciting weeks in the history of modern Egypt as lived by their protagonists. Since the 25th of January 2011, together with thousands of other Egyptian citizens, No ha, Ahmed and Essayed have been involved in a massive movement of street protest for political freedom. Day after day, sleepless night after sleepless night, until the capitulation of the defeated pharaoh, the film follows these young and unexpected heroes along their shattering fight to conquer their freedom.

description.tr: Bir evlilik, iki aşk, üç bela, Dokuz Kere Leyla... Adem (Haluk Bilginer), güzeller güzeli metresi Nergis (Elçin Sangu) için Leyla (Demet Akbağ) ile 20 yıllık evliliğini bitirmeye karar verir. Ancak Leyla'dan doğal bir yolla kurtulması neredeyse imkansızdır. Diğer yandan bu duruma bir çözüm bulamazsa, yasak aşkı Nergis, çok yakında parmaklarının arasından kayıp gidecektir. Üstelik Adem tüm bu aşk trafiğininin arasında kendisine ait antika el yazmasının peşinde olan Mahdum Bey (Fırat Tanış) ve kıskanç avukatı Haris (Alican Yücesoy) ile de uğraşmak zorundadır.

Kapılar birer birer yüzüne kapanırken karısı Eda’nın çocukluk arkadaşları Egemen’den yardım istemesiyle İrfan kendisini hayal bile edemeyeceği karanlık bir maceranın içinde bulur. Evlenmek üzereyken ayrıldığı büyük aşkı İlay’ın tehlikeli iş adamı Süleyman’ın sevgilisi olarak ortaya çıkmasıyla birlikte, İrfan bu macerada aşması gereken birçok sınavla karşı karşıya kalacaktır. description.tr: Cinayetten Affa: Cyntoia Brown’un Hikayesi, 16 yaşındayken ömür boyu hapse mahkum edilen genç bir kızın hikayesini konu ediyor. 16 yaşındaki Cyntoia Brown, 2004 yılında kendisini taciz eden 43 yaşındaki bir adamı öldürdüğü için tutuklanır. Henüz reşit olmamasına rağmen yetişkin olarak yargılanan Cyntoia, ömür boyu hapse mahkum edilir. Yıllarca hakkında verilen karara itiraz eden Cyntoia’nın geçmişi, fizyolojisi ve yasa hakkındaki sorular, onun suçluluğunun sorgulanmasını sağlar.
description.en: After 16-year-old Cyntoia Brown is sentenced to life in prison, questions about her past, physiology and the law itself call her guilt into question.

description.tr: Dansçı olan April, Broadway’de seçmelere katılır. Ancak seçmelerde çuvallayan April, istediği başarıyı elde edemez. Bunun üzerine genç kadın, memleketine geri dönmeye karar verir. Doğup, büyüdüğü kasabada hayatına yön vermeye çalışan April, çok istemese de yarışmaya hazırlanan bir grup genç dansçıya koçluk yapmaya başlar. April öyle ya da böyle müzik ile birlikte yaşamaya devam edecektir.
description.en: After failing to find success on Broadway, April returns to her hometown and reluctantly is recruited to train a misfit group of young dancers for a big competition.

description.tr: Back in the 80s and 90s, Sudheer (Sanjay Mishra) was an ‘aloo’ – a moniker given to character actors – and while he has enjoyed his fair share of popularity for his larger-than-life roles, Sudheer is now a recluse. However, an unsuccessful video interview with the media stirs up old memories and instils a new ray of hope in his heart, to reach a new benchmark and face the camera, even if it is for one last time.
description.en: Sudheer is an actor from the heyday of Bollywood. Years after his retirement, he realizes that he 'retired' on the verge of accomplishing a unique record. He decides to come out of his retirement to complete the round figure of 500.

description.tr: A shy comedian gets his big break but soon realises he needs to murder people in order to keep his mojo on stage.
description.en: A timid, small-town comedian's long-awaited big break takes a dark turn when he realizes committing murder is the only way to keep his onstage mojo.

description.tr: A petty thief learns about his father's illustrious legacy and decides to attack the man who murdered him in order to bring the ancient martial art form that his father had practiced to limelight.
